item-attributes.item-attribute: Head
GRDN, CHSW, ELAR, CRSB, SPRD, KNOC, ICED, STMD, BRSK, FLMD, SPRM, RVR, RNGR, CLRC, DRU, SHMN, BTLM, MONK, PLDN, SCT, HLR, WAR
Face
GRDN, CHSW, ELAR, CRSB, SPRD, KNOC, ICED, STMD, BRSK, FLMD, SPRM, RVR, RNGR, CLRC, DRU, SHMN, BTLM, MONK, PLDN, SCT, HLR, WAR

tier.tier-desc: Rough leather is sewn together from the typically mismatched pieces of various animal hides. Although very inexpensive to manufacture, it offers only the most minimal protection.
Tanned leather is constructed from animal hides treated with tannin. Tannin is made from boiled tree bark and water adding durability and longevity to the armor.
Hardened leather is thicker and more resilient than standard leathers. High quality tannins increase the rigidity of the pieces giving the armor its name.
Reinforced leather is the pinnacle of non-magical organic armors. Further fortification using additional pieces of leather plating make this armor a solid deterrent to most attacks.
Essence leathers extend organic armor construction to the next level by utilizing magical methods to further toughen the hide without sacrificing mobility.
